attributes.action: Revoke TV Licence Fee & make BBC TV & Radio opt in paid for services
attributes.additional_details:
It is wrong that anyone watching any live or catch up television, regardless of channel, should be forced to pay a licence fee. There are hundreds of channels available for viewing & only the BBC requires the licence fee, as others are advertising backed. 

People should have the choice to opt in / pay for the BBC services they actually want.
attributes.background: People should have the choice to pay for the BBC services they actually want and not be forced to pay a general fee for all.
